definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: We need to unleash massive private investment in clean energy.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在清洁能源方面发动大量的私人投资。
实体基础设施和能源行业。

sentences.english: Fourth, solving the energy supply problem in rural areas through the establishment of fuel woods.
sentences.chinese: 四是通过营造薪炭林，解决农村能源问题。

sentences.english: Everyone in the energy business believes that carbon-pricing will come, but when?
sentences.chinese: 能源行业的每一个人都认为将会对碳定价，但何时呢？

sentences.english: The non-energy resources are not abundant in Britain, It mainly dependent on imports of industrial raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 英国的非能源资源不丰富，主要工业原料依赖进口。

sentences.english: The Fund's selection in Capital Goods and Energy detracted performance.
sentences.chinese: 我们于资本财货及能源行业的选股表现影响基金价值。

sentences.english: The omission of heat straightening may save energy and thus reduces production cost.
sentences.chinese: 特别是取消热调直可节约能源，从而降低生产成本。

sentences.english: He will also visit an energy-efficient cement plant.
sentences.chinese: 他还将参观一座有效利用能源的水泥厂。

sentences.english: Ultra lightweight and breathable Energy Cloak fabric.
sentences.chinese: 超轻量级和能源雨衣织物透气。

sentences.english: Use the special resource re-supply table for Benelux included in these rules.
sentences.chinese: 使用特别的补充能源表，请见附件。

sentences.english: In turn, the cheaper lighting has led to higher overall energy use.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，更便宜的照明灯导致了使用能源总量的上升。

sentences.english: Power consumption is controlled by management software.
sentences.chinese: 能源消耗由管理软件控制。

sentences.english: Are plans to pump water from the Bohai Sea to China's arid far west necessary to ensure energy supply?
sentences.chinese: 中国渤海水西调工程对确保能源供应是必须的吗？

sentences.english: Energy security is the theme of this year's G-8 summit in St.
sentences.chinese: 能源安全是今年圣彼得堡八国峰会的主题。

sentences.english: Their design is described in the Journal of Renewable and Sustainable Energy. [Bharat Raj Singh and Onkar Singh, http://bit.ly/bFd3dO]
sentences.chinese: 他们的这项设计发表在《可再生与可持续能源》上。

sentences.english: High-efficiency water heaters can drive down home energy costs.
sentences.chinese: 高效节能热水器可以大大降低家庭能源费用。
